comments:
Our instance filter tests are not working. By dumb luck the tests pass due to 
the way they are written (we test that a breakpoint is not hit, since it is 
filtered out). The tests pass because the event requests fail to get enabled, 
and the following is written to the log:

This is due to the fact that the VM running the tests does not support instance 
filters. They are only supported by 1.4 VMs. Running the tests on a 1.4 VM does 
not cause this problem.

Added checks to the tests - tests are only completed if instance breakpoints 
are supported. This makes the tests a little pointless, but it means when we 
migrate to using a VM that supports the breakpoints (in the build), the tests 
will just start to run.

Fixed.
Please verify, Darin S. (Changes in InstanceFilterTests).
